actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To establish a program of Federal grants to assist local educational agencies to establish and provide for a school year of not less than 240 days.

summary.text: Competitive American Schools Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to provide grants to assist local educational agencies to increase the number of school days to not less than 240 days each year. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To establish a program of Federal grants to assist local educational agencies to establish and provide for a school year of not less than 240 days.
